sections.name: Urbel
sections.text: This creature did not include a description.

traits.name: Unique
traits.text: A rules element with this trait is one-of-a-kind. The DC of Recall Knowledge checks related to creatures with this trait is increased by 10.

traits.name: Chaotic
traits.text: Chaotic effects often manipulate energy from chaos-aligned Outer Planes and are anathema to lawful divine servants or divine servants of lawful deities. A creature with this trait is chaotic in alignment.

traits.name: Evil
traits.text: Evil effects often manipulate energy from evil-aligned Outer Planes and are antithetical to good divine servants or divine servants of good deities. A creature with this trait is evil in alignment.

traits.name: Fey
traits.text: Creatures of the First World are called the fey.

traits.name: Gremlin
traits.text: Cruel and mischievous fey, gremlins have acclimated to life on the Material Plane.

gear.name: pouch with 4 gold teeth worth 3 gp each

automatic_abilities.name: Kneecapper
automatic_abilities.trigger: A Medium creature within Urbel's reach leaves a square during its move action
automatic_abilities.effect: Urbel lashes out at the triggering creature's knees. He attempts an Acrobatics check against the creature's Reflex DC. On a success, the target falls and lands prone.

traits.name: Fatal
traits.text: The fatal trait includes a die size. On a critical hit, the weapon’s damage die increases to that die size instead of the normal die size, and the weapon adds one additional damage die of the listed size.

traits.name: Shove
traits.text: You can use this weapon to Shove with the Athletics skill even if you don't have a free hand. This uses the weapon's reach (if different from your own) and adds the weapon's item bonus to attack rolls as an item bonus to the Athletics check. If you critically fail a check to Shove using the weapon, you can drop the weapon to take the effects of a failure instead of a critical failure.

traits.name: Finesse
traits.text: You can use your Dexterity modifier instead of your Strength modifier on attack rolls using this melee weapon. You still use your Strength modifier when calculating damage.

traits.name: Agile
traits.text: The multiple attack penalty you take with this weapon on the second attack on your turn is –4 instead of –5, and –8 instead of –10 on the third and subsequent attacks in the turn.

traits.name: Finesse
traits.text: You can use your Dexterity modifier instead of your Strength modifier on attack rolls using this melee weapon. You still use your Strength modifier when calculating damage.

ability.name: Bully
ability.text: Any melee weapon Urbel uses gains the shove trait, and if he rolls a critical failure when attempting to Shove a creature with the weapon, he treats the result as a failure instead.

ability.name: Pound Down
ability.text: Urbel's melee Strikes deal an additional 1d6 damage to prone targets.
